game.name: Fortune Wheel
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fortune Wheel is a stylish rogue-lite "Wheel-Builder" game. You'll spin the wheel, add cards, and trigger chain synergies to pay the ever-increasing rent. Your fate is spinning... Can you pay the rent?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fortune Wheel is a stylish rogue-lite "Wheel-Builder" game. You'll spin the wheel, add cards, and trigger chain synergies to pay the ever-increasing rent. Your fate is spinning... Can you pay the rent?
